Before the start of the course, we recommend the students to familiarize themselves with $\mathtt{R}$ and $\mathtt{R}$ studio. A primer to $\mathtt{R}$ and data visualisation in $\mathtt{R}$ can be found in:

- R Basics: <https://dodona.ugent.be/nl/courses/335/>

- R Data Exploration: <https://dodona.ugent.be/nl/courses/345/>
